title: Is it permissible to kill stray cats outside my home?  | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: her second question was about killing stray cats so if these cats harm you I know you they enter and trespass into your home's to the kitchen spoiled food urinate or defecate in your own house you're allowed to do whatever is necessary to get rid of their evil even by killing them but if these stray cats are on the streets outside your home you're just annoyed by their sound or voice or noise this is not permissible for you to kill an animal for that because there is no actual harm inflicted upon you by such animals and Alonzo L knows best
